Engaging

September 21st, 2008 · 13 Comments

The lovely Miss Macy accepted my proposal of marriage tonight. We then set off to the Austin Symphony to celebrate the occasion.

Let’s get to the stuff the girls care about. It’s a 1.5 carat yellow sapphire.
